title: Point Reyes National Seashore: Scoping Documents
body: Giacomini Wetland Restoration Project: Scoping Documents       On this page, you will find documents that were published to alert and educate the public about the National Park Service's plans for the Giacomini Wetland Restoration Project and to invite the public to participate in the planning process. Summary of Scoping Comments - July 2004 (78 KB PDF) Detailed Background on Existing Resource Conditions in Project/Study Area - June 2004 Description of Project - June 2004 (661 KB PDF) California Environmental Quality Act Notice of Preparation of a Joint Environmental Impact Statement/Environmental Impact Report - May 29, 2003 (19 KB PDF) Brief Description of Project - 2003 (382 KB PDF) Summary of Scoping Comments - December 2002 (41 KB PDF) Notice of Public Scoping - September 25, 2002 (9 KB PDF) Notice of Intent to Prepare an Environmental Impact Statement published in Federal Register - September 23, 2002 (9 KB PDF)  Adobe® Acrobat Reader® is needed to view PDF documents. Top of Page
